Package network.rmi

Class MyTask

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.TimerTask
      • network.rmi.MyTask
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable
    public class MyTask
extends java.util.TimerTask
    This class extends TimerTask and schedules a task for a given player to manage possible disconnections.

        game - game number
        identifier - player identifier
        nickName - player nickname
        server - server

    • Method Detail

      • run

        public void run()
        Launches thread to carry out the task. It aims to safely terminate the program should a player disconnect (and the conditions in manageDisconnection are met). In case of InterruptedException however, the game must not exit.
        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable
        Specified by:
        run in class java.util.TimerTask
